attributes.action: Seek to rejoin the European Union
attributes.additional_details: We would like to rejoin the EU as we think that Brexit has manifestly failed to deliver the benefits it promised.
attributes.background: We would like the Government to seek to rejoin the European Union. We believe negotiations for re-entry should commence.
